name: max-elixir
effect: Used on a party Pokémon : Restores PP to full for each move.
short_effect: Restores PP to full for each move.

flavor_text.black_white: It fully restores the PP of all the moves learned by the targeted Pokémon.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: It fully restores the PP of all the moves learned by the targeted Pokémon.
